title: Product Gallery Image Loading and Display
description: Verify that product gallery images load correctly with all thumbnails displayed and the main image is visible.

steps.description: Navigate to a Product Details Page with a gallery.
Check that all gallery images and thumbnails are loaded without errors.
Verify the main product image is visible and correctly rendered.

title: Product Gallery Swipe Functionality
description: Ensure that swiping the product gallery navigates between images smoothly.

steps.description: On the Product Details Page gallery, perform swipe gesture or use navigation controls to move to the next image.
The next image in the gallery should be displayed correctly.
Swipe back to the previous image.
The previous image in the gallery should be displayed correctly.

title: Product Gallery Zoom Feature
description: Validate that zooming on a product image functions correctly and resets on demand.

steps.description: Navigate to the Product Details Page and trigger zoom on the main gallery image.
The image should zoom in smoothly and display more detail without distortion.
Reset zoom to normal view.
The image returns to its original scale and the UI remains stable.

title: Rendering Multiple Product Card Variants
description: Confirm that all product card variants (search, listing, featured, compact) render correctly with appropriate layout and content.

steps.description: Load the product listing page and locate each type of product card variant.
Verify distinct layouts for search product cards, new product cards, compact product cards, and featured product cards.
Ensure product images, names, prices, and other relevant information appear correctly in each variant.

title: Product Card Navigation to Product Details
description: Check that clicking or tapping on any product card navigates the user to the correct Product Details Page.

steps.description: From the product listing page, click on various product cards across different variants.
Confirm that each click opens the correct Product Details Page corresponding to the clicked product.

title: Complete Product Details Page Information
description: Verify that the Product Details Page displays all required information including product description, specifications, pricing, and availability.

steps.description: Navigate to the Product Details Page of a product.
Check presence and accuracy of product name, detailed description, price, specifications, and stock status.
Ensure the integrated product gallery with thumbnails and zoom/swipe is functional on this page.

title: Add Product to Shopping Cart from Product Card
description: Validate that users can add products to the shopping cart directly from product cards.

steps.description: On a product listing page, click the 'Add to Cart' button on a product card.
Verify that the shopping cart count increases by one and the selected product is added with correct details.

title: Add Product to Shopping Cart from Product Details Page
description: Ensure that products can be added to the cart from the Product Details Page and updated cart reflects the addition.

steps.description: Navigate to a Product Details Page and click the 'Add to Cart' button.
Confirm the shopping cart count increments and the cart includes the correct product information and quantity.

title: Shopping Cart Item Management
description: Test that users can update item quantities and remove items in the Shopping Cart properly with UI reflecting changes.

steps.description: Navigate to the Shopping Cart page with items already added.
Increase the quantity of a cart item and verify the new quantity is shown.
Ensure the cart total price updates correctly according to the new quantity.
Remove an item from the cart.
Verify the item is removed and the cart updates with the correct item count and total.

title: Checkout and Order Success Confirmation
description: Verify that upon successful checkout, the user is redirected to the Order Success Page displaying correct order confirmation details.

steps.description: Complete the checkout process from the Shopping Cart page.
Ensure redirection to the Order Success Page occurs.
Validate the displayed order confirmation details including order number, items purchased, and total amount.

title: Viewing Order History
description: Confirm that the Orders Page accurately lists the user's past orders with details retrieved from state or backend.

steps.description: Navigate to the Orders Page.
Check that all past orders are listed with correct order numbers, dates, statuses, and totals.
Select an individual order to view order details.
Verify detailed information of selected order including items, quantities, prices, and delivery status.

title: Global State Management Consistency
description: Validate that global application state using React Context remains consistent across components under various user actions.

steps.description: Add multiple products to cart from different product cards and product details pages.
Verify that the shopping cart state updates correctly in all components reflecting the same data.
Navigate to Orders Page after placing orders.
Confirm order data is updated and consistent between state and displayed information without race conditions or stale data.

title: Shopping Cart Quantity Edge Cases
description: Test the shopping cart behavior for edge case quantities including zero, negative numbers, and large quantities.

steps.description: Attempt to set the quantity of a cart item to zero.
Validate if the item is removed or quantity reset according to requirements.
Attempt to input negative quantities.
Ensure the input is rejected or corrected to valid minimum quantity.
Attempt to input a very large quantity.
Verify system handles it gracefully without crashing or errors, possibly with validation messages.

title: Product Details Navigation Back and State Preservation
description: Ensure that navigating back from Product Details Page to product listings preserves previous scroll positions and state consistency.

steps.description: From the product listing, navigate to a Product Details Page.
Use browser back or application back navigation.
Verify the previous product listing page scroll position and filters/selections remain unchanged.

title: Product Image Thumbnail Selection Updates Main Image
description: Test that clicking on any thumbnail in the product gallery updates the main displayed image correctly.

steps.description: On the Product Details Page, click on a thumbnail image in the gallery.
Validate that the main product image updates to the selected thumbnail image.
